SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core

Interface ResourceConsumer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AudioRepository, BackgroundAudioMediaPlayer, BackgroundDelegate, CustomFont, DynamicSpriteEntity, ImageRepository, SpriteEntity
public interface ResourceConsumer
Implementing a ResourceConsumer exposes a default methode that can be used to acquire the absolute path to a resource available on the class path.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default String
    createPathForResource(String resource)
    Returns the absolute path for a given Resource.

  • Method Details

    • createPathForResource

      default String createPathForResource(String resource)
      Returns the absolute path for a given Resource.
      Parameters:
      resource - the Resource, which should be available on the class path
      Returns:
      the relative path to the Resource
      Throws:
      com.github.hanyaeger.core.exceptions.ResourceNotAvailableException - an ResourceNotAvailableException is thrown if the resource can not be found on the class path
